Eugene Kuleshov wrote:
> Cedric,
> 
> What could be value of repeated test alone?
> 
> In JUnit 3 I'm using RepeatedTest together with ActiveTestSuite to
> perform rudimentary concurrency testing, but that is about it.

It would be an easy way to check a requirement like "this random value 
needs to be between 12 and 20" by running the test 1000 times or something.

It has been useful capturing a test for an "intermittent" defect.
